mapper.select: SELECT * , course_type.course_type_name FROM Course JOIN course_type ON course.course_type_id = course_type.id limit (#{pageNum}) * 6,6;
SELECT course.course_name FROM student JOIN student_course ON student.id = student_course.student_id JOIN course ON student_course.course_id = course.id WHERE student.id = #{student_id};

SELECT course.course_name,course.teacher_name,lesson.time_sort,lesson.room,lesson.week_time FROM student JOIN student_course ON student.id = student_course.student_id JOIN course ON student_course.course_id = course.id JOIN lesson ON student_course.course_id = lesson.course_id WHERE student.id = #{student_id} and lesson.week = #{week} and lesson.terms = #{terms};
SELECT course_type.course_type_name FROM course JOIN course_type ON course.course_type_id = course_type.id WHERE course.id = #{course_id};
